translation: Earn GOLD. Use GOLD to purchase supplies and improve your characters.
Earn TRAINING MODULES. Use TRAINING MODULES to level up your characters.
Earn ABILITY MATERIALS. Use ABILITY MATERIALS to upgrade your character's abilities.\n\nOnly CONTROLLERS & PROTECTORS allowed.
Earn HEALTH PACKS and BLITZ CHARGES. Use HEALTH PACKS to heal injured characters and BLITZ CHARGES to bypass their recovery time for battles in Blitz.\n\nOnly BRAWLERS & SUPPORT allowed.
Earn ORB FRAGMENTS. Collect enough ORB FRAGMENTS to unlock free ORBS.
Earn CATALYSTS. CATALYSTS are essential to improving your characters' gear.\n\nOnly BLASTERS allowed.

Fury wants only the best S.H.I.E.L.D. agents to join him on elite S.T.R.I.K.E. missions. Pass his trials and prove your mettle.

- Five (5) Mercenaries
- Mercenary Star Rank requirement increases by 1 with each level

- Bullseye

- Mercenary Sniper

The I am Iron Man Event has started!

Tony Stark's technical prowess and presence would be invaluable to our ranks. Assemble a team of 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents to work with him and stop an evil plot. Elite S.H.I.E.L.D. agents will be available in Blitz for the month!

Requirements: 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents
Event Start: Jun. 13, 2018 12:00 AM (UTC)
Event End: Jun. 27, 2018 11:59 PM (UTC)

Sabretooth is now available in the <color=#fff568>Premium Orb</color> as an exclusive reward!

Sabretooth is the second of the Brotherhood mutants to arrive and an important addition to your Mutant squad for an upcoming Legendary Event. He specializes in tearing through the enemy ranks; punish your enemies for taunting with <color=#fff568>Thrash</color> and hemorrhage the backline with <color=#fff568>Blood Rush</color>. Combine him with other <color=#fff568>Brotherhood</color> characters to further enhance his damage output.

Don't hesitate to add the feral mutant to your team -- recruit Sabretooth now!

Note: He will remain in the Premium Orb after this card disappears from the Events carousel.

As the first Commander to complete Fear the Darkness, Widowmaker chose two characters for a Double Shard event! The first character is Black Panther. For today only, you'll earn extra Black Panther shards from Cosmic 3-9!

We're excited to commemorate the first year of MARVEL Strike Force with you! In honor of our 1-Year Anniversary, we will have the following events:

- 3 reactivated Event Campaigns as voted by the community
- 3 reactivated Team-Up Events
- 2x Gold in Campaign missions
- 2x Gear in Campaign missions
- 2x Character Shards in Campaign missions
- Quarter Blitz
- Reduced Campaign Energy refresh cost
- Reduced Raid Heal cost
- A special anniversary calendar in addition to the monthly calendar

As a part of our 1-Year Anniversary celebration, healing and reviving characters in Raids will only cost 10 and 25 Raid Health Packs, respectively, for the next 24 hours. Use this opportunity to coordinate with your Alliance and push further in Raids!

As a part of our 1-Year Anniversary celebration, the cost to purchase 120 Campaign Energy will remain at 50 Power Cores for the next 24 hours. Use this time wisely to collect as much gear and character shards as you can!
